text: Ronald David Johnson (September 12, 1956 â€“ January 26, 2021) was an American baseball player and minor league manager. He played for the Kansas City Royals from 1982 to 1983 and Montreal Expos in 1984. He coached the Boston Red Sox from 2010 to 2011. Johnson was born in Long Beach, California. Johnson died on January 26, 2021 in Morrison, Tennessee from COVID-19, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Triple-A Norfolk Tides manager Ron Johnson chats with Jim Hunter via YouTube Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Tennessee Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Montreal Expos players Category:Sportspeople from Long Beach, California
title: Ron Johnson (baseball)
